title: Awareness Agent Evaluation Persona
description: Object representing a request to evaluate one or more items in the role of the specified persona from the supplied perspectives

name.title: Persona Name
name.description: The name given to this persona

id.title: Persona ID
id.description: The internal ID for this persona (ignore)

type.title: Persona Type
type.description: Internal identifier of the persona type (ignore)

gender.title: Gender
gender.description: What gender does this persona identify as

does.title: Does
does.description: What does this persona do in their work and personal life

feelThinkBelieve.title: Feel/Think/Believe
feelThinkBelieve.description: What does this persona feel, think and believe; what is their outlook on life, priorities etc

technologyExperience.title: Technology Experience
technologyExperience.description: What experience does this persona have with technology

problems.title: Problems
problems.description: What problems does this persona encounter

needs.title: Needs
needs.description: What needs does this persona have

existingSolutions.title: Existing Solutions
existingSolutions.description: What solutions does this persona currently employ to address their problems and meet their needs
